csv_cc_msg: Numbers include {cc}. This will override the saved code.
try_again: Try uploading csv or Excel file
app_desc: This app receives an excel file & sends texts.The excel should have tel number & message columns.
cannot_send_msg: You cannot send messages right now. Please upgrade to send.
import_google_sheet_desc: Import a Google Sheet by providing the URL of the sheet. The sheet must be publicly accessible.
google_sheet_import_error: Error importing Google Sheet. Please check the URL and ensure the sheet is publicly accessible.
google_sheet_empty: The Google Sheet is empty or cannot be read. Please check the sheet and try again.
no_internet_connection: No internet connection. Please check your network.
google_sheet_private_error: This Google Sheet is private or requires login. Please use a public sheet that anyone with the link can view.
invalid_google_sheet_url: Invalid Google Sheets URL format. Please provide a valid URL.
google_sheet_url_invalid: The link is not a valid Google Sheets URL.
google_sheet_access_denied: Access denied. Make sure the sheet is public (shared with 'Anyone with the link').
